column5: The Master of Science in Data analytics for business is a two-year program designed for students who have a strong interest in data analysis.The Master program provides students with a solid understanding of Statistics and Computer science, along with domain-specific knowledge in Business.This program is entirely taught in English and aims at:
column7: European residents: A student may pay from a minimum of about € 3600 (for lower family incomes and cheaper courses) to a maximum of about € 9000 (for higher family incomes and more expensive courses) per year.  Non-European residents: The full tuition fee amount is € 8540 per year.
